title.value: Современное состояние, направление и перспективы развития селекции льна-долгунца в Республике Беларусь
Present condition, directions and perspectives of fiber-flax breeding development in the Republic of Belarus

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Korolev, K.P., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Flax

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus the estimation of the modern condition, achievements and the main directions of breeding work on long fiber flax (Linum usitatissimum) was realizes. Along with the traditional research directions there were presented some of the promising to help optimize the selection process and enhance its effectiveness. There were analysed the following current and prospective directions of long fiber flax breeding: quality; resistance to seed cast; yielding capacity of flax fiber and seeds; soil acidity; high degree of planting density; intensity of photosynthesis; resistance to lodging; drought resistance; resistance to harmful objects; resistance to herbicides. Research results proved that the further development of breeding processes of long fiber flax in the Republic of Belarus should be directed towards creation of highly productive varieties with good quality indexes, resistance to the unfavourable environment factors, noxious organisms on the basis of application of modern methods of genetics, physiology, biochemistry, and biotechnology.
